Name: Tavern Table Tactics
About the game: Tavern Table Tactics is a tactical computer tabletop game that combines a traditional two-player board game setting with tactical RPG combat. Take turns battling a friend in this turn-based tactical computer board game to see who can claim bragging rights as the master tactician. Features 6 unique unit types at your disposal Classic tactical RPG combat mechanics Unique weapon and unit abilities to unleash at the opportune moment Several game modes, each with their own objectives for victory Single-player mode with strategy component planned for future release
